text:
Looking forward to Hollywood

Actor Deepika Padukone has left for Canada to shoot for Hollywood film XXX : The Return of Xander Cage . She has said that she is looking forward to a fun experience working with Vin Diesel. “In the two or three interactions that I have had with him [Vin Diesel], he is just a very warm person. I think it will be a fun experience working with him,” she said.

At an event in New Delhi on Tuesday, her Bajirao Mastani co-star and rumoured beau Ranveer Singh shared the news about Deepika’s departure for the shoot that night. “May you conquer this new frontier and make us proud as you always have,” said Ranveer. — IANS
title: It will be fun to work with Vin Diesel: Deepika Padukone
